name: ’83 Atheist Quotes
author: Eric Hamby

sections.description: Get some great quotes evcerytime you visit your admin dash on your Wordpres site.
sections.faq:
May I recommend some new features?

Yes please do. I offer a forum for such things located here: http://since83.com/topic/20-atheist-quotes/

Where can I get support?

At the support forums on Since83.Com: http://since83.com/topic/20-atheist-quotes/

I need some help modifying this. Can you help?

Yes I can. http://since83.com/topic/20-atheist-quotes/ and let e know what you need.
sections.changelog:
1.3

  • Fixed punctual errors
  • Added ’16’ more quotes
  • Added our facebook link
  • Fixed some ‘readme’ text errors
  • Removed IndexJunkie.Com link and replaced it with Since83.Com
  • Changed banner image on Wordpres.Org

1.2

  • Fixed fatal errors when used with other plugins by me
  • Added support links to plugin menu for easy help

1.1

  • Changed title of plugin in dash
  • Moved quotes from admin header to admin dash
  • Added more quotes

1.0

  • First release

short_description: This plugin puts some great quotes by Atheist on the dash of your Wordpress admin panel.
description: Get some great quotes evcerytime you visit your admin dash on your Wordpres site.
